name: chatter
caption: Chatter

effect.short: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.
effect.full:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to [confuse]{mechanic:confuse} the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of [confusion]{mechanic:confusion}.  If the user is not a []{pokemon:chatot}, this move will not cause [confusion]{mechanic:confusion}.

This move cannot be copied by []{move:mimic}, []{move:mirror-move}, or []{move:sketch}, nor selected by []{move:assist}, []{move:metronome}, or []{move:sleep-talk}.

flavorText:
The user attacks the target with sound waves of
deafening chatter. This confuses the target.
